about_the_game:
Step into the world of Homeward!

As a rookie police officer, you’re tasked with much more than law enforcement. In this heartwarming 2D pixel art adventure, you’ll complete missions, solve mysteries, and help your neighbor, Jenny, find her missing cat, Mac. Explore a charming, open world full of engaging quests, delightful mini-games, and meaningful career choices that lead to multiple endings.

🔍 Explore a Vibrant Open World

Roam through bustling neighborhoods, peaceful parks, and lively locales as you interact with quirky characters and uncover hidden secrets. Every corner holds a new adventure! Take a break from missions, explore the map, or simply relax—there’s always something to discover.

🕵️‍♂️ Complete Engaging Missions

Take on diverse missions that test your detective skills. From solving petty crimes to helping locals with their everyday troubles, every choice matters!

🧩 Solve Mysteries with Mini-Games

Put your skills to the test with fun mini-games that add variety to your detective work. These games help you gather clues, unlock new areas, and climb the police ranks!

🌈 Nostalgic Pixel Art & Sound Design

Get lost in a beautifully crafted pixel art world, filled with warmth and charm. The soothing soundtrack brings the town to life, creating a heartwarming atmosphere throughout your journey.

🐈‍ A Story with Heart (and Cats!)

Based loosely on a true story, Homeward is filled with characters inspired by real-life cats. Choose to play as either Amelia or George and dive into a world where every name holds a special meaning.

🌐 Learn More

Peek behind the scenes and discover more about Homeward at our website.
